page.title: 16XXXXXXX/ROAD
page.content: The people in XXXXXXX Road will always help each other. The AAAs, for example, have a large extension in front of their house which is undecorated. They let us store our furniture there while our house was treated for subsidence. If I ever come home and find no-one in I can go down to the BBBs to watch television until my parents come home. Harry BBB used to go to school with my Dad and comes to our house quite often to play cards. The lady across the road is about 60 and comes out about 7.30 in the morning to sweep leaves from her drive. We call her "nosey Rosie" as she is always peeping round the curtains, seeing what is going on. A few years back the man who lived in the end house lost his wife and some months later he was found hung in his bathroom.
